name: market for glycerin distillate bottom | glycerin distillate bottom | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22763/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'glycerin distillate bottom', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This dataset is a consumption mix, representing the supply of 'fermentation filtrate'' from activities that produce it, to activities that consume it within the geography of this dataset, Global.;This is a constrained market. The justification for a market constraint is included in the comment field of the conditional exchange. ;This product is generally considered to be used in a close proximity of its production site. Therefore, a minor amount of transportation is also considered in this market.;Glycerin distillate bottom, is a recyclable by-product from the esterification of rape seed oil in certain geographies. It is further used in agriculture as a source of of potassium.

The activity starts at the place where glycerin distillate bottom is produced.

The activity ends with the provision of glycerin distillate bottom to its respective consumers.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

exchanges.description: It is considered that glycerin distillate bottom is used by plantations located close to its production plants, therefore 5 km of transportation are here considered.

flow.name: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road
